executable.title: Compute Image Statistics Using Mask (TubeTK)
executable.description: Compute image statistics for each region indicated in a mask file.
executable.acknowledgements: This work is part of the TubeTK project at Kitware.

image.name: outputMeanImage
image.label: Output Mean Image Volume
image.description: Each mask component is represented by the mean image value for that component.

file.name: csvStatisticsFile
file.label: CSV File of Statistics
file.description: Write component statistics to a CSV formatted file
